message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You got lucky last round, now it's my turn to take the lead!
You took a big chunk, now it's my turn to take a smaller bite!
You took a big bite, now I'll take a bigger one!
You're taking too much, I'll give you a smaller share, but don't expect more!
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a small chance to reconsider!
You're getting greedy, I'll give you a small share, but don't think you're getting the better end of the deal!
You're running out of time, I'll give you a tiny chance to get something!
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a tiny share, but don't expect me to go easy on you!
You're almost out of time, I'll give you a tiny fraction of the pie!
You're trying to lowball me, I'll give you a tiny fraction, but don't think you're getting off easy!
You've had your chance, now it's my turn to take the last crumbs!
